## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09000](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BPP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** BASIC PROLINE-RICH PROTEIN2
- **Description:**   proline-rich family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G09000.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09000.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [bpp125]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Abnormal leaf pavement cells, abnormal leaf shape, short roots, reduced leaf elongation, shorter siliques.
